entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH OMG!!! Please stop with this Corona Virus. There isn't enough deaths to even call it a pandemic. We don't want Socialist Distancing and or Contact Tracing for a flu like virus, or even at all! You don't stop the country for any threat @WhiteHouse! #WalkAway #MAGA2020 #COVID19
